sub_title: Indirect Tax Control Framework  at NXP Semiconductors

profile_positions.description:
The ITCF Manager report into the Senior Director Indirect Tax.
The ITCF manager is the process owner and subject matter expert of NXP’s global ITCF and accountable (take ownership of) for successful implementation, embedding, sustaining and maintaining of this ITCF, including managing and coordinating activities of others.

Responsibilities:
- Auditing/monitoring of correct execution of the Indirect Tax Control Framework activities by others and ensure issues are handled properly.
- Develop work instructions, training materials and controls for the reporting, payment and refund building block and ensure correct implementation worldwide.
- Assist Senior Director Indirect Tax with optimized usage of incentives, handling special projects, follow up on legislative changes and handling of tax audits.
- Support  the setup of the COE Indirect Tax team, including SAP training
- Participate in several projects. f.e. Freescale integration project, including ensuring correct SAPNXP system and master data implementation.
profile_positions.title: Indirect Tax Control Framework Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Assist the Senior Director Indirect Tax with worldwide compliance for indirect tax
- Prepare and submit Indirect tax returns & EcC transaction listings for various EU countries in accordance with the ITCF (Indirect Tax Control Framework) work instruction.
- Support F&A, SSC Chennai and Customer Service Centre on VAT and billing questions / issues.  - Responsible for Tax related masterdata changes in SAP (includes validation and approval of changes).
- Prepare new procedures and improve existing ones and train where needed.
- Facilitate communication, work instructions, training, (process) improvements to support activities performed by SBE, SSC Chennai and Customer Services Centre.
- Participate in multi-cross-functional projects.
profile_positions.title: International Indirect Tax Compliance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the quarterly Sales Revenue Recognition analysis, the Global Balance Sheet review and the Monthly Manual Invoicing report. Report directly to the Regional Global Sales & Marketing EMEA controller.

Support Sales, F&A , Fiscal and IT on Process Improvements & system and procedures (SAP- FI/SD); representing sales EMEA in IT Governances:
- Customer billing (selfbilling, manual invoicing, returns, VAT,  etc)
- Masterdata
- KPI reporting

Participate in multi-cross-functional project teams to represent professional accounting & reporting aspects.
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Interpret NXP Corporate Control administrative instructions and deploy these. 
- Ensure F&A billing and accrual accounting processes are in compliance with NAP, IFRS and GAAP accounting principles and according to NXP Group instructions. Organize, analyze and execute business controls to be SOX compliant. 
- Responsible for the customer billing and tax accounting and the correspondent SOX controls.
- Support of a timely and correct billing related activities:  customer billing / GL / VAT reporting / manual invoicing.
- Report the Monthly MIT (manual invoicing)  directly to Regional controller.
- Facilitate communication, work instructions / procedures(new or improvements)  to support activities performed by SBE, SSC Chennai and Customer Services Centre.

Participate in multi-cross-functional project teams to represent professional accounting & reporting aspects.
profile_positions.title: Billing Accountant Controller
Assistant controller for sales offices: Poland and Hungary
